items.sentence: Tell me what you\'re looking for and I\'ll help you find it.
Tom knows why Mary decided not to go on the picnic with him.
I wouldn\'t be too surprised if Tom didn\'t show up on time.
I wouldn\'t have been able to do that if Tom hadn\'t helped.
Tom knew that people were going to say bad things about him.
Tom left the city late that night to avoid getting arrested.
Tom likes to be busy and hates sitting around doing nothing.
Tom likes to lounge around the house without any clothes on.
I wish I hadn\'t promised Tom I\'d go to Australia with him.
I\'d be lying if I said I haven\'t thought about doing that.
